1100010010000100 0101011100011000 1 -> sum: 0001101110011101, cout: 1

1000010100111010 1010100100001111 1 -> sum: 0010111001001010, cout: 1

0111110010001000 0110101110101110 0 -> sum: 1110100000110110, cout: 0
